verses.verse: Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H935>"Go<s%> in to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H3068>him,<s%> 'This is what Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> "Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may serve <S%H5647>me.<s%>
For if you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to let them <S%H7971>go,<s%> and hold them <S%H2388>still,<s%>

<S%H3027>behold,<s%> the hand of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> on your <S%H4735>livestock<s%> which are in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> on the <S%H5483>horses,<s%> on the <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> on the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> on the <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and on the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will make a <S%H6395>distinction<s%> between the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H1697>nothing<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of all that belongs to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"'"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> a set <S%H4150>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4279>"Tomorrow<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that <S%H1697>thing<s%> on the next <S%H4283>day;<s%> and all the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> but of the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> <S%H259>and,<s%> behold, there was not so much as one of the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> of the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H4191>dead.<s%> But the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H3513>stubborn,<s%> and he <S%H5971>didn't<s%> let the people <S%H7971>go.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> to you <S%H2651>handfuls<s%> of <S%H6368>ashes<s%> of the <S%H3536>furnace,<s%> and let <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> it toward the <S%H8064>sky<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

It shall become small <S%H80>dust<s%> over all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and shall be a <S%H7822>boil<s%> breaking <S%H6524>out<s%> with <S%H76>boils<s%> on <S%H120>man<s%> and on <S%H929>animal,<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

They <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6368>ashes<s%> of the <S%H3536>furnace,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> it up toward the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> and it became a <S%H7822>boil<s%> breaking <S%H6524>out<s%> with <S%H76>boils<s%> on <S%H120>man<s%> and on <S%H929>animal.<s%>

The <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7822>boils;<s%> for the <S%H7822>boils<s%> were on the <S%H2748>magicians,<s%> and on all the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and he <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H3068>them,<s%> as Yahweh had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Rise up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3068>him,<s%> 'This is what Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> "Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may serve <S%H5647>me.<s%>

For this <S%H6471>time<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> all my <S%H4046>plagues<s%> against your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> against your <S%H5650>officials,<s%> and against your <S%H5971>people;<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is none like me in all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For now I would have stretched <S%H7971>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> you and your <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and you would have been cut <S%H3582>off<s%> from the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

but indeed for <S%H199>this<s%> <S%H5668>cause<s%> I have made you <S%H5975>stand:<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> you my <S%H3581>power,<s%> and that my <S%H8034>name<s%> may be <S%H5608>declared<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>earth;<s%>
as you still <S%H5549>exalt<s%> yourself against my <S%H5971>people,<s%> that you <S%H7971>won't<s%> let them go.

<S%H4279>Behold,<s%> tomorrow about this <S%H6256>time<s%> I will cause it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H1259>hail,<s%> such as has not <S%H3644>been<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> the day it was founded even until <S%H3117>now.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H7971>command<s%> that all of your <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and all that you have in the <S%H7704>field<s%> be <S%H5756>brought<s%> into <S%H120>shelter.<s%> Every man and <S%H929>animal<s%> that is <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H622>isn't<s%> brought <S%H1004>home,<s%> the <S%H1259>hail<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> on <S%H4191>them,<s%> and they shall die."'"

Those who <S%H3373>feared<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> among the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> made their <S%H5650>servants<s%> and their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> into the <S%H1004>houses.<s%>
Whoever <S%H7760>didn't<s%> respect the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and his <S%H4735>livestock<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> that there may be <S%H1259>hail<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> on <S%H120>man,<s%> and on <S%H929>animal,<s%> and on every <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> throughout the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H4294>rod<s%> toward the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> <S%H6963>thunder,<s%> <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and <S%H784>lightning<s%> flashed <S%H1980>down<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H1259>hail<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

So there was very severe <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and <S%H784>lightning<s%> <S%H8432>mixed<s%> with the <S%H1259>hail,<s%> <S%H3966>such<s%> <S%H3515>as<s%> had not <S%H3808>been<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> since it became a <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

The <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> all that was in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal;<s%> and the <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> every <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> every <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
Only in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> where the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1259>were,<s%> there was no hail.

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2398>them,<s%> "I have sinned this <S%H6471>time.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and I and my <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

<S%H6279>Pray<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for there has been <S%H7227>enough<s%> of <S%H430>mighty<s%> <S%H6963>thunderings<s%> and <S%H1259>hail.<s%> I will let you <S%H7971>go,<s%> and you shall <S%H5975>stay<s%> no <S%H3254>longer.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3318>him,<s%> "As soon as I have gone out of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> I will spread <S%H6566>abroad<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> The <S%H6963>thunders<s%> shall <S%H2308>cease,<s%> neither shall there be any more <S%H1259>hail;<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s.
But as for you and your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you <S%H3372>don't<s%> yet fear <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>"
The <S%H6594>flax<s%> and the <S%H8184>barley<s%> were <S%H5221>struck,<s%> for the <S%H8184>barley<s%> was in the <S%H24>ear,<s%> and the <S%H6594>flax<s%> was in <S%H1392>bloom.<s%>
But the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and the <S%H3698>spelt<s%> were not <S%H5221>struck,<s%> for <S%H2007>they<s%> had not grown <S%H648>up.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and spread <S%H6566>abroad<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and the <S%H6963>thunders<s%> and <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H2308>ceased,<s%> and the <S%H4306>rain<s%> was not <S%H5413>poured<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

When <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H4306>rain<s%> and the <S%H1259>hail<s%> and the <S%H6963>thunders<s%> were <S%H2308>ceased,<s%> he <S%H2398>sinned<s%> yet <S%H3254>more,<s%> and <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> he and his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> and he <S%H1121>didn't<s%> let the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> just as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
